member.name: T:SenCompressSharp.SenCompress
member.summary: Provides a means by which the underlying D language library's functions may be accessed.

member.name: M:SenCompressSharp.SenCompress.Compress(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Compresses a supplied byte array. Returns the compressed version of the byte array.
member.param: The byte array containing the file or data to compress.

(Default = 254) A value preferably between 0 and 254 that declares how many bytes the compressor visit before any specific byte to search for matching patterns. Increasing this value compresses the data to smaller filesizes at the expense of compression time. Changing this value has no noticeable effect on decompression time.

member.name: M:SenCompressSharp.SenCompress.Decompress(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decompresses a supplied array of PKG Type 1 (RLE) compressed file bytes (including 12 byte header) and returns a decompressed copy.
member.param: The individual RLE compressed data with header to decompress.

member.name: M:SenCompressSharp.SenCompress.Decompress(System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decompresses a supplied array of PKG Type 1 (RLE) compressed file bytes (including 12 byte header) and returns a decompressed copy.
member.param: The individual RLE compressed data with header to decompress.
